# HandleChangeDecibelValue

**Instance Method**

Tells the slider control the decibel value is changing.

## Declaration

```swift
kern_return_t HandleChangeDecibelValue(float in_decibel_value);
```

## Parameters

- **in_decibel_value**: The new decibel value to set.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/DriverKit/kIOReturnSuccess] on success, or another value if an error occurs. For a list of error codes, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/DriverKit/error-codes].

## Discussion

The default implementation calls [doc://com.apple.audiodriverkit/documentation/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioLevelControl/SetDecibelValue] and returns [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/DriverKit/kIOReturnSuccess]. Subclass and override this method to handle changes to the stream format and return [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/DriverKit/kIOReturnSuccess] upon success.

## Supporting Value Changes

- **HandleChangeScalarValue**: Tells the slider control the scalar value is changing.
